additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Lysine hydrochloride 150 mg, Thiamine hydrochloride (vitamin B1) 5 mg, Pyridoxine hydrochloride (vitamin B6) 2.5 mg, Cyanocobalamin (vitamin B12) 12.5 micrograms, Iron (as ferric pyrophosphate) 5 mg

additionalProperty.name: Contains
additionalProperty.value: Sodium Benzoate, Sorbic Acid, Flavouring, Colouring, Ethanol. 200 mL oral liquid

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: This product contains 4.0g/5mL of sorbitol, which may have a laxative effect or cause diarrhoea. The use of a metric measuring device for accurate dose measurement is recommended. Not for the treatment of iron deficiency conditions. Vitamins can only be of assistance if the dietary vitamin intake is inadequate. Keep out of reach of children. In case of accidental overdose, discontinue use and contact your doctor or Poisons Information Centre (Australia 13 11 26, New Zealand 0800 764 766) immediately. Tamper resistant pack. Do not accept if seal around cap is broken or missing.

description: Centrum Cherry Flavour Kids Incremin Liquid
name: Cherry Flavour Kids Incremin Liquid
